name: The Friday Group
legal: Project depended of the King Baudoin Foundation
goal: The Friday group is a Belgian policy think tank for young people from various backgrounds financed by the King Baudoin Foundation. We publish reports and opinion pieces in Belgium's mainstream media, organise roundtables with key decision and opinion makers, and public conferences.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Public Health, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
The comitology reform
The work of the Committee on Women's Rights and Gender Equality of the European Parliament
